entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [FAIL] System.Threading.Tests.PeriodicTimerTests.PeriodicTimer_ActiveOperations_TimerRooted #66798
  • IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract gets permissions error when run under C:\Program Files\ #66796
  • CrossGen2 nupkg on linux-musl-arm64 environment links to wrong libc #66791
    6.0.x
  • DataContractSerializer calls IDeserializationCallback before serialization is completed. #66788
  • [NativeAOT] EXEC : error : Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow. "...fsbackup2.msbuildproj" System.OverflowException: Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow #66787
  • `AssemblyName.FullName` doesn't show `PublicKeyToken` portion when the `AssemblyName` instance is returned from `AssemblyName.GetAssemblyName` #66785
  • HttpConnectionPool may leak authorityExpireTimer / hit ObjectDisposedException #66782
  • TlsHandshakeType value 24 should be labeled KeyUpdate #66781
  • System.Collections.Sort<BigStruct>.LinqQuery has regressed on all configs except Windows 64 bit #66776
  • System.Threading.Tests.Perf_Timer.SynchronousContention has regressed on macOS x64 #66774
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: List<T>.Slice #66773
  • Building src/native results in "ignoring unknown option: --minimize" #66770
  • GC deadlock/livelock? #66759
  • [API Proposal]: Add ImmutableArray.Contains overload that accepts an IEqualityComparer<T> #66758
  • System.Resources.Extensions.DeserializingResourceReader cannot load an assembly if .NET WinForms controls are used inside a C++ app #66799
  • XPS documents memory leak (System.Windows.ContextLayoutManager+LayoutQueue+Request and XpsDocument.GetFixedDocumentSequence()) #66756
  • System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.CooperativeBlockingCanCreateThreadsFaster has failed #66755
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Tests.Perf_BitArray and System.Collections.IndexerSet<Int32> #66769
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #66768
  • Test failure JIT\\Stress\\ABI\\pinvokes_d\\pinvokes_d.cmd #66745

Closed

  • Cannot use BenchmarkDotNet with NativeAOT #66637
  • Cannot find mkstemps nor mkstemp on this platform (CMake Error at src/runtime.*/artifacts/source-build/self/src/src/libraries/Native/Unix/configure.cmake:788) #66340
  • Analyzer Suggestion: Don't seal properties on sealed types #41980
    Future
  • [DllImport] on Windows fails to load library on case sensitive filesystem #66608
  • Implement an analyzer to detect usage of RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute #52726
    Future
  • [New rule] Notify that foreach may throw InvalidCastException #54629
    Future
  • Serializing public interface with internal implementation works with JSON but not with XML #60523
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `NativeLength` in `Array` #66775
  • Analyzer proposal: ThreadStatic on a non-static field #46626
    7.0.0
  • build.sh command not build coreclr in OSX #66789
  • [wasm][debugger] Show a better stack trace for final user #63466
  • ArrayPool returns an array of 2_097_152 elements when asked 1024 * 1024 + 1 (1_048_577) #66779
  • Boxing / Unboxing operations in Vectors ? #66780
  • PeriodicTimer_ActiveOperations_TimerRooted failure on Debian 10 #62809
  • threading.WaitForSingleObject.WFSOExSemaphoreTest failed in CI on Centos #6920
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonEncodedText equivalent to XmlWriter #64513
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping needs sudo to ping an endpoint in .NET 7 preview 2 #66746
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.CooperativeBlockingCanCreateThreadsFaster test failed #65954
  • Visual Basic Bug for net6.0 when using StartsWith with a function call inside starts with for ascii characters that are not normal keyboard characters #66751
  • [API Proposal]: Add UriSchemeUrn field to Uri #66293
    7.0.0
  • .net 6 broken migration JsonElement to dynamic #66517
  • Binding to non-null IEnumerable doesn't work #36390
    7.0.0
  • Package versioning vs framework versioning #66722
    Future
  • sqlpackage AdditionalDeploymentContributor dll .net 6.0 #66732
  • Remove dotnet6 feeds when dependencies publish into dotnet7 feeds. #57716
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'comp->supportSIMDTypes()' #66206
    7.0.0
  • Bug in System.IO Directory.GetDirectories and Directory.GetFiles methods when used with System.IO.SearchOption.AllDirectories #65180
    Future
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Roslyn\\CscBench\\CscBench.cmd #66564
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_35821\\GitHub_35821\\GitHub_35821.cmd #66565
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json 5.0.0 cannot refer to System.Text.Json 5.0.1 #66532
  • Regressions in System.Net.Http.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerPerfTest #66343
    7.0.0
  • Make all structs that claim to be thread-safe dereference `this` at most once per entrypoint #14746
    Future
  • [wasm] Regression on windows/AOT - `mono-aot-cross.exe` crashes every time #66718
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource` #66802
    community-contribution
  • Track all HttpConnectionPoolManager instances in a global list #66801
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Remove delegate/closure allocations from DynamicAssemblies.IsTypeDynamic #66797
    area-System.Xml
  • perf: Pass --dotnet-path to use dotnet-workload for wasm #66795
    arch-wasm
  • Use shared SocketAddress code in QUIC #66794
  • [wasm] Do not set _WasmDevel=true for blazor projects #66793
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Reenable 4611 and 4703 #66792
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Disable Windows arm32 pinvoke stress tests #66790
    disabled-test
  • Fixed TlsHandshakeType enum label #66786
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Replace AsArgument/AsParameter with less P/Invoke-centric concepts #66784
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    community-contribution
  • Use no-recent-activity in inactive Draft PRs #66771
  • [mono][interp] Fix a few local store warnings #66766
  • Try to fix a time-sensitive thread pool test #66765
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Remove superfluous string[] and string from System.IO.Packaging.ContentType #66764
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Improve exception thrown when constructing SslCertificateTrust #66763
  • Reduce string allocations in XmlWriterTraceListener #66762
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Bump IntelliSense package to .NET 7.0 Preview1 #66753
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Fix cancel in PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync #66752
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [mono] Hot Reload: support for reloadable types #66749
    area-EnC-mono
  • Dedup patterm/options/timeout in Regex source generator #66747
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Workaround NuGet error in Content_Types #66744
    area-Serialization

Merged

  • Fix emscripten-version.txt link #66778
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Implement missing SymUnmanaged* interfaces #66650
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reimplement stubs to improve performance #65738
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Always append the "dll" extension for native libraries loads on Windows #66666
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Ensure the generic math interfaces are implemented implicitly where possible #66748
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix incompatibility between runtime and nuget package #66295
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't show the wasm functions on callstack when debugging managed code #64223
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66605
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Surface native sourcelink on CoreCLR native PDBs for easier dump debugging #66677
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Temporarily disable test failing on OSX #66761
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update area owners to add 2 triagers #66767
  • Fixes Binding to non-null IEnumerable doesn't work #36390 #66131
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace StringBuilder with ValueStringBuilder in AssemblyName.FullName #66750
    tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Merge icall-def-netcore.h back into icall-def.h #66730
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove dotnet6 feeds #66447
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove test coverage of FeatureSIMD=0 #66670
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Reenable CA 4701 #66676
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Bump next from 11.1.3 to 12.1.0 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-nextjs #65534
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix too narrow loads while unspilling #66675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Port Access violation occurring in System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation fix from .netfx to .net-core #66726
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Move basic w32file* and w32process* functions to eventpipe #66731
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make the `EventSource` generator incremental et.al. #64579
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [PERF][TEST] Enable use MONO_ENV_OPTIONS="--llvm" on perf runs. #66742
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add flags checks to BMI1 intrinsic lowering #66736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Only use first field maps for shared statics #66558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Load C++/CLI DLLs built against .NET 7.0+ in default ALC #66486
    area-Host
  • Support using the system version of brotli #66462
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for checked user-defined operators #66714
    area-Meta
  • WIP: [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Use ROS<byte> instead of byte[] where it makes sense on S.S.C.Cose #66741
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Change ConfigurationBinder to avoid reading properties unnecessarily. #66723
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Adds Range Manipulation APIs for Collection<T> and ObservableCollection<T> #65101
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Consolidate sync/async JsonSerializer test abstractions #66729
    area-System.Text.Json, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [mono] Fix static virtual calls to generic methods from gshared code #66739
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][jit] Pass generic context when ldftn of generic method #66350
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update windows build machines #65798
    area-Infrastructure
  • Run illink before ApiCompat #66706
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging aot on CI #66685
    arch-wasm
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
  • [mono][wasm]Enable WASM exceptions as an experiment #66524
    NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
